body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.28 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for IRDA protocol.
Faster initial wineprefix creation.
Axis remapping with evdev joysticks.
More image formats in WindowsCodecs.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
